Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1S (peptide C;  Leu-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals, UCLL1a)
Sequence Information.Source: southern leopard rogs,Rana sphenocephala, USA, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Initially reported as pedptide C by Conlon et al. (Conlon et al., 1999). APD analysis reveals that the sequence of temporin-1s shows 50% similarity toTemporin-GH. Because of such a sequence similarity, the authors re-named peptide C as temporin-1S. Showed much weaker dose-dependent activity against pathogenic chytrid fungus B. dendrobatidis (MIC 250 uM). For additional peptides with higher activity against this fungus, please refer toAP453;AP454;AP455). Temporin-1S is predicted to be helical.
Literature Information.Author: Holden WM, Reinert LK, Hanlon SM, Parris MJ, Rollins-Smith LA. 2015
Literature Information.Title: Development of antimicrobial peptide defenses of southern leopard frogs, Rana sphenocephala, against the pathogenic chytrid fungus, Batrachochytrium dendrobatidis
